greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Values of C (the hypotenuse) of a Pythagorean triangle with A (the short leg) and C both prime and part of a twin prime.
comment: All terms of the sequence must be part of a Pythagorean triple of the form (2u-1), 2u*(u-1), (2u^2 - 2u + 1). - _Joshua Zucker_, May 12 2006
xref: See A051642 for the A's and A051858 for the B's.
results.author: Stuart M. Ellerstein (ellerstein(AT)aol.com), Dec 14 1999
